auths.accountIdKey: LocalStorage key for current account id
auths.accountUrlMatcher: RegExp string for account API request
auths.analystUrlMatcher: RegExp string for user/analyst API request
auths.rolesUrlMatcher: RegExp string for roles API request
authStateKeys: List of LocalStorage keys to store for authentication state
authShareKeys: List of Auth State keys allowed for sharing
auths.accountNamePath: Path to property with account name, use dot-notation
auths.analystNamePath: Path to property with analyst name/id etc, use dot-notation

urls.PROD: URLs for sending events, PROD is default on UI and must exist

ffOverrides.propertyPath: Path to FFs container object, use dot-notation
